name: Beast Mode Phonk
description: A high-energy phonk track with heavy bass and aggressive beats.

name: NCS - NoCopyrightSounds
description: NoCopyrightSounds (NCS) is a record label that releases free music for creators. The label was founded in 2011 by Billy Woodford and has since gained a large following on platforms like YouTube and SoundCloud. NCS focuses on electronic music, including genres like dubstep, house, and drum and bass. The label's mission is to provide high-quality, copyright-free music for content creators, allowing them to use the tracks in their videos without worrying about copyright issues.
